## Regression
```{R}
setwd('~/lecture/riii/')
house = read.csv('~/lecture/riii/data/house-prices.csv',header = T)
model = lm(formula = Price~SqFt,data = house)

plot(house$SqFt,house$Price)
abline(model,col='red')

#殘差分析
par(mfrow=c(2,2))
plot(model)

#檢定殘差是否為常態分配
#H0:殘差為常態分配
shapiro.test(model$residuals)
#檢查殘差是否獨立
install.packages('car')
library(car)
durbinWatsonTest(model)
#檢定各殘差變異數是否相等
#H0:各殘差變異數相等
ncvTest(model)

summary(model)
```
